title: Homeland Security raids Diddy properties, compares operation to Epstein
summary: Homeland Security conducts simultaneous raids on Sean Combs' properties in Los Angeles and Miami as part of a sex trafficking investigation. Federal agents explicitly compare Combs' alleged operation to Jeffrey Epstein's network, citing similar methods of recording compromising material, controlling victims, and maintaining blackmail archives. The raids uncover extensive recording equipment and storage devices, suggesting systematic documentation of activities at Combs' properties over decades.
